medical_history.chief_complaint: Induction of labor due to grade 1 Fetal Growth Restriction (FGR).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Fetal Growth Restriction diagnosed at 30 weeks of pregnancy, with slow weight gain starting from the 20th week of gestation. Weekly assessments conducted after the diagnosis. The patient started labor pre-induction at 36 + 3 weeks of gestation, with monitoring of fetal well-being before labor.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Pregnancy-induced hypertension managed with methyldopa. No other significant medical history reported.
medical_history.family_history: Neither the patient nor her husband had any history of genetic disorders in their families.
